AIConfiguration.msdyn_customconfiguration:
{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Given a collection of Power Automate objects "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"flowJSON"},{"type":"literal","text":" , generate a structured result JSON that summarizes each flow. The output should include a list of all flows, with each entry containing the following details:
Name: Extract the flow name. 
Description: Summarize the flow’s purpose and key operations.
Triggers: Identify and list the triggers that initiate the flow.
Actions: Provide a detailed list of actions performed by the flow.
Ensure that:
The output JSON is structured as an array where each element represents a single flow summary. Each flow’s details are extracted from its respective JSON object. The result JSON is technical, professional and clean, making it suitable for generating an HTML interface.

Expected JSON Output format

[
 {
 "Name": "OrderProcessingFlow",
 "Description": "Automates the order processing workflow, including sending confirmation emails and updating order status.",
 "Triggers": [
 "New order created"
 ],
 "Actions": [
 "Send email",
 "Update order status",
 "Log activity"
 ]
 },
 {
 "Name": "InventoryReplenishmentFlow",
 "Description": "Monitors inventory levels and sends alerts when stock is low.",
 "Triggers": [
 "Stock level below reorder point"
 ],
 "Actions": [
 "Send email alert",
 "Create purchase order"
 ]
 }
]

"}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"flowJSON","text":"flowJSON","type":"text","quickTestValue":"[
